text:
The STIX project is apparently about to release a set of OpenType fonts,
progress can be monitored at http://www.stixfonts.org/finalsteps.html

Depending on license conditions, these fonts could be used for testing FOP,
either bundled with it or by asking users to download them separately.
creator: bdelacretaz@codeconsult.ch

text:
Here is the user license for the STIX fonts:
http://www.stixfonts.org/user_license.html
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text:
I just had a look at http://www.stixfonts.org/finalsteps.html and it still says:

"The glyphs will be packaged for beta release into large OpenType fonts. [The
following packaging is currently under review. Revised packaging will be issued
as soon as a final decision is made.]"
creator: bdelacretaz@codeconsult.ch

text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org
